snippet: A digital project features the advertising that surrounded "Our Mutual Friend" while it was serialized, as well as links to maps and letters.
abstract: A digital project features the advertising that surrounded "Our Mutual Friend" while it was serialized, as well as links to maps and letters.

headline.main: And Now a Word From Charles Dickens's Sponsor...
headline.print_headline: Dickens and Advertisements: A Gallery Opens Online
